Debrief: DhiWise, now also operating under the brand Rocket.new, is a programming automation platform that converts designs into production-ready code for web and mobile applications. With the introduction of Rocket.new, it aims to democratize app development by enabling users, regardless of technical expertise, to build applications using simple AI prompts, thereby accelerating the development lifecycle. [13]
CompanySize_Employees: Estimated 60-86 employees based on various reports from 2024-2025. [2, 3, 6, 11]

CoreOffering_Summary: DhiWise, now also known as Rocket.new, is an AI-powered platform that automates the conversion of design prototypes (e.g., Figma) into clean, production-ready code for web and mobile applications. With Rocket.new, it expands its offering to enable users, including those without technical expertise, to build applications rapidly using simple AI prompts, acting as an 'AI software engineer' to accelerate the entire application development lifecycle. [13]
KeyFeatures_AI_Automation: AI-powered code generation from designs (Figma to code)
Automates repetitive coding tasks and the application development lifecycle
Generates readable, modular, reusable, and developer-friendly source code
Smart Editor with auto-identification of reusable elements
Supports AI Training & Fine-Tuning, Machine Learning & Adaptive Learning (as listed features)
AI software engineer functionality for prompt-based app creation (Rocket.new) [13]
KeyFeatures_NoCode: Graphical User Interface (GUI) for essential features
Operates in low-code and pro-code environments
Ability to build apps with simple prompts, requiring no code (via Rocket.new) [13]
Automation_Scope: Converts designs into production-ready code for front-end (Flutter, React, React Native, HTML, Kotlin, Swift, Shopify Liquid, Android, iOS) and backend (Node.js, Laravel) web and mobile applications. Automates the entire application development lifecycle, including authentication, data binding, API management, data modeling, deployment, and version control. [4, 13]
Underlying_Technology: AI-powered platform that generates code for popular frameworks (React, Flutter, Node.js, Kotlin, Swift, Laravel) and utilizes open-source libraries (e.g., GetX, Connectivity, FlutterToast, Tailwind CSS). [12]
Integration_Capabilities: Shopify (via Figma to Shopify Converter and Shopify Liquid support) [4]
Customization_Level: Generates human-readable and editable source code, allowing developers to customize UI, screen navigation, API management, and other aspects of the generated code. Offers pre-built templates and customization options. Rocket.new aims to provide clean and functional code that can be understood, modified, and built upon by developers. [13]
TargetAudience_Primary: Developers, IT service companies, Web and Mobile app Development Companies, Startups, Small and Medium Enterprises with developer teams. With Rocket.new, the target audience expands to include individuals and businesses regardless of their technical expertise, aiming to democratize app development. [13]
TargetAudience_PersonasMatch_Seido: Partial Match. While DhiWise traditionally targeted developers and technical teams, the recent launch of Rocket.new with its 'no code required' and 'AI software engineer' capabilities suggests a move towards empowering a broader audience, potentially including non-technical founders who seek to build applications without coding. This aligns more closely with Seido's personas (non-technical founders seeking to build AI-powered businesses). [13]
ValueProposition_USP: Accelerates application development by automating design-to-code conversion and generating clean, production-ready code. With Rocket.new, it further differentiates by enabling rapid app creation using simple AI prompts, democratizing app development for users of all technical backgrounds and acting as a comprehensive AI software engineer. [13]
Positioning_Statement: DhiWise, now evolving into Rocket.new, positions itself as the world's first 100 percent developer-centric ProCode platform that automates programming to speed up application development and improve results by converting designs into production-ready code. With Rocket.new, it expands this to be an AI software engineer that empowers anyone to build web and mobile applications with simple prompts, requiring no code. [9, 13]
MarketSegment_Focus: Software Development, Application Development, DevTools, Low-Code/No-Code, AI-Powered Development.
BusinessModel: SaaS, Subscription-based, with Freemium and Custom/Enterprise plans.
Pricing_Tiers_Summary: Offers a Free Plan with limited features, a Pro plan (starting at $149/year), and Custom/Enterprise plans. [5, 9]
Recent_News_KeyDevelopments: Rebranded and launched 'Rocket.new' on May 30, 2025, as an AI software engineer enabling 'no code required' app building with simple prompts, aiming to democratize app development. [13]
Completed Series A funding round of $66K on March 13, 2024, bringing total funding to $9.96M (Tracxn) or $10M (Owler). [3, 4, 8]
Awarded Product Hunt 'Developer Tool of the Year 2021'
Launched DhiWise Figma to Shopify Converter
Reported 5.4X rise in revenue in FY23
Aggressive plans to increase user base to 200,000 (as of Feb 2023)
Published articles on AI-driven frontend automation (April 2025). [4]
Reported_Strengths: Significantly accelerates application development (up to 10x-20x faster)
Generates clean, readable, modular, reusable, and production-ready code
Automates repetitive and mundane coding tasks, boosting developer productivity
Strong integration capabilities with design tools (Figma), APIs, and version control (Git)
Supports a wide range of popular web and mobile development technologies/frameworks
Offers no-vendor lock-in for generated code
Comprehensive development tools including debugging, data modeling, and collaboration features
AI-powered code generation for enhanced efficiency
Democratizes app development by enabling 'no code required' creation via AI prompts (Rocket.new) [13]
Sales_Approach: Utilizes a freemium model to attract users, with paid subscription tiers (Pro, Custom/Enterprise plans) for advanced features. Targets startups and small to medium enterprises with developer teams, and now also aims to attract a broader audience including non-technical users with its 'no code required' offering via Rocket.new. [13]
Geographic_Presence: Headquartered in India (Surat), with a global target audience for its developer tools.
Average_Rating_Overall: Generally positive, recognized with Product Hunt 'Developer Tool of the Year 2021' award. Specific average ratings vary or are not consistently available across all platforms.
Review_CommonThemes_Positive: Saves significant time and effort in app development
Generates high-quality, clean, and production-ready code
Features like Smart Editor and real-time rendering are highly valued
Potential for rapid app creation with simple prompts (Rocket.new) [13]
Relevance_To_NonTechnicalFounders: High Relevance. With the launch of Rocket.new, DhiWise explicitly targets non-technical users, claiming 'no code required' for building applications using simple AI prompts. This directly aligns with Seido's mission to empower non-technical founders to build businesses without coding. [13]
AI_As_Technical_Cofounder_Analogy: Yes, DhiWise, particularly with its Rocket.new offering, positions itself as an 'AI software engineer' that assists users in building applications, including those without technical expertise. This aligns strongly with the 'AI as a technical cofounder' analogy, now extending beyond just enhancing developer productivity to enabling non-technical users. [13]
Agent_Reusability_Platform_NetworkEffect: DhiWise focuses on generating reusable code and components for application development. While Rocket.new introduces AI-powered prompt-based creation, there is no explicit mention of a platform for multi-agent systems or a marketplace for reusable AI agents, which remains a key differentiator for Seido. [13]
EaseOfUse_For_SeidoPersonas: Medium to High. While the core DhiWise platform is developer-centric, the new Rocket.new offering explicitly aims for ease of use for non-technical users by enabling app creation with 'simple prompts' and 'no code required'. The actual ease of use for complex business logic and AI integration for Seido's personas would need further evaluation, but the stated intent is a significant shift. [13]
Seido_Differentiation_Points: Seido differentiates itself by providing a comprehensive no-code platform for non-technical founders to build and scale AI-powered multi-agent systems, including an initial idea validation assessment and a marketplace for reusable AI agents. While DhiWise (via Rocket.new) is now moving into 'no code required' app building, its primary focus remains on generating traditional web/mobile application code. Seido's unique value lies in orchestrating and operationalizing *AI agent ecosystems* for business automation, a distinct offering from general app development. [13]
Threat_Level_To_Seido: Medium to High. Previously low, the threat level increases significantly with DhiWise's launch of Rocket.new, which explicitly targets non-technical users with 'no code required' app building via AI prompts. This directly overlaps with Seido's core value proposition of empowering non-technical founders to build without coding. However, Seido's specific focus on *multi-agent systems* and *AI-powered businesses* (beyond just general apps) still provides a differentiation. [13]
Opportunity_For_Seido: DhiWise's strategic shift with Rocket.new validates the growing market demand for AI-powered no-code solutions for non-technical users. Seido can capitalize on this by further emphasizing its specialized focus on enabling non-technical founders to build and scale *complex AI-powered multi-agent systems* and *entire AI-driven businesses*, which goes beyond standard web/mobile app generation. Seido's unique offering of an AI agent marketplace and comprehensive business automation capabilities remains a strong differentiator. [13]
Notes_QualitativeInsights: DhiWise has made a significant strategic pivot with the launch of Rocket.new, moving beyond its traditional developer-centric, pro-code focus to explicitly target non-technical users with 'no code required' AI-powered app building. This positions it as a more direct competitor to platforms like Seido that aim to empower non-technical founders. While DhiWise's strength remains in generating clean, production-ready code for standard web/mobile applications, Seido's differentiation lies in its focus on multi-agent systems and comprehensive AI-powered business automation. [13]
